clauses.title: Maintenance Services
clauses.body: The Provider agrees to perform maintenance services for the Client at [service_or_property] as described: [detailed description of services]. Services include [specific tasks] performed [frequency]. Emergency services may be available outside normal hours at additional rates.

clauses.title: Service Fees
clauses.body: The Client shall pay $[fee] per [service period] for the maintenance services, payable [payment terms]. Additional parts/materials are billed at cost plus [percentage]% markup. Invoices are due within [number] days of receipt. Late payments may incur [percentage]% monthly interest.

clauses.title: Service Standards
clauses.body: The Provider shall: perform services in a workmanlike manner; use quality materials; comply with applicable codes; maintain insurance; and clean up after work. The Client shall: provide safe access; secure pets; and make necessary arrangements for Provider to perform work efficiently.

clauses.title: Warranties and Liability
clauses.body: The Provider warrants workmanship for [number] days and manufacturer warranties apply to parts. The Provider is not liable for pre-existing conditions or damage not caused by negligence. Liability is limited to the service fee amount. The Client should maintain appropriate property insurance.

clauses.title: Term and Termination
clauses.body: This agreement runs for [term] and automatically renews for successive [period] terms unless either party gives [number] days written notice. Either party may terminate immediately for material breach. The Client pays for services rendered up to termination date.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.body: This agreement is governed by the laws of the State of New York.

annotations.tooltip: Workmanship warranty period and limitations of liability for pre-existing conditions.
